doc:
William Hickey (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Hickey_(actor) 0 William Edward Hickey (September 19, 1927 – June 29, 1997) was an American actor. He is best known for his Academy Award-nominated role as Don Corrado Prizzi in the John Huston film Prizzi's Honor (1985), as well as Uncle Lewis in National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation (1989) and the voice of Dr. Finklestein in Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas (1993). William_Edward_Hickey ( September_19_,_1927 – June_29_,_1997 ) was an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_Academy_Award-nominated_role as Don_Corrado_Prizzi in the_John_Huston_film_Prizzi 's_Honor_(_1985_) , as_well_as Uncle_Lewis in National_Lampoon 's_Christmas_Vacation_(_1989_) and the_voice of Dr._Finklestein in Tim_Burton 's_The_Nightmare Before Christmas ( 1993_) .
